answers.answer: Don't feel bad... With my first daughter I gained 60lbs and was more active then before my pregnancy and lost 25lbs with my second daughter.... I'm sure you look amazing... !!!

I've gained 20 and am at 30wks tomorrow. .. I'm way shorter than you and got pregnant around 160.. I'm really worried because I failed my glucose test(not by much) and found out I'm anemic....I'm more depressed about the diet change than anything. ..you'll b fine,  just try to eat as healthy as you can and exercise:)

I was 175 5'8" when I got preggo with my 1st son gained over 50lbs and doc was never concerned about it but I always had normal bp and no gestational diabetes if uve had any issues then I can understand ur docs concern otherwise don't stress it won't do u or baby any good

question: Im 29 weeks, just about 30 in a cpl more days and im feeling fat! Ive gained about 17 lbs so far and this is my first baby. Im 5.10 and weighed 165 lbs before pregnancy and my doc told me not to gain more then 25. Im actually still quite shocked she said only 25 considering my weight was appropriate for my height. So the stress of going over that with still about 10 weeks to go is annoying. Any other ladies sharing the same feelings??? Im sure theres lots!
title: feeling fat
